long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: docker-1.10.2-11.gitddbb15a.fc24 uses %triggerpost to try to add a trigger to the docker-v1.10-migrator package, but that isn't recognized by RPM, so it instead becomes a piece of the docker-selinux %postun script. My guess is that it meant to use %triggerun instead.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): docker-1.10.2-11.gitddbb15a.fc24.x86_64
How reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. rpm -q --scripts docker-selinux 2. rpm -q --triggers docker-v1.10-migrator
Antonio could you verify that this is fixed?
*** Bug 1332302 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
it is not - I'm taking care of it with Lokesh
